Question: Simon & Garfunkel recorded "So Long, this person" as a tribute to this person.
Hints: His family had grown to six children, but this person was not paternal and the brood required most of Catherine's attention.
To supplement his income and repay his debts, this person accepted independent commissions for at least nine houses.
This person could not bear the new hostility from his master and thought the situation was unjust.
